p: In Spain, olive orchards are nowadays one of the main irrigated crops (818,505 ha), only exceeded by cereals (889,411 ha) [ 3]. Water scarcity is one of the main issues all over the world, and it has a clear effect on agriculture. Regulated deficit irrigation (RDI) and sustained deficit irrigation (SDI) are some of the techniques that are being developed to confront this problem. RDI decreases the use of water during some specific growing states of olives, while SDI decreases the water applied in a uniform way during all the growing season [ 4].
